title: Competitive Battling
introMessage:
Competitive Tutoring

Welcome to Competitive Battling! Learn competitive movesets, how to teambuild effectively and battle with some level of expertise! Learn more about the current metagame and to become familiarized with the central/main tiers.

                

If you wish to test your competitive team, just PM #Camilas with your team format and the request to battle! Credits to Mystifi for this nice roomintro and thanks :)
